name: Chamile
description:
DevLog

TigSource Devlog - https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=67258.0

(alternatively cutt.ly/chamile)

What is Chamile?

It's a power-up platformer inspired by several games, not the least of which is "Kid Chameleon", the 1992 Sega Genesis Cult Classic.

What stage is this game in?

The files uploaded at this moment are for a first rough prototype. I will continue to make prototypes even rougher than this (visually, anyways) to allow the community to play new levels and power-ups which I am making.

Please check out the DevLog (cutt.ly/chamile) for the full details!
